derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Latin deliquescere 'dissolve', from de- 'down' + liquescere 'become liquid' (from liquere 'be liquid')

means.word_mean: 1. melt away in the process of decay;
2. melt or become liquid by absorbig moisture from the air;
